# ZERO TOLERANCE RULES
The rules below are absolute. Players caught violating them may be banned without prior warning.
- Players must be at least 16 years of age to play on Monolith Station servers. Any player under 16 years old will be banned until they are of age. - Absolutely no sexual content or erotic roleplay (ERP), including direct or indirect mentions of sexual behavior, actions or jokes. - Absolutely no hate speech, including slurs, bigotry, racism, specism (demeaning other characters in-game due to their in-game race), sexism, or ableism. - Do not use exploits, cheats, or external programs to gain an unfair advantage or disrupt the server in any way. - Attempting to evade game bans or job/role bans will result in an appeal-only ban.
- Do not intentionally strike the Colonial Outpost (CO). -- Do not intentionally strike docked ships at CO.
